entities.description: Circumstances that justify a homicide according to legal definitions.
Circumstance where a criminal attacked a police officer, resulting in the officer killing the criminal.
Circumstance where a criminal attacked a fellow officer, leading to the criminal being killed by another police officer.
Circumstance where a criminal attacked a civilian.
Circumstance where a criminal attempted to flee from a crime.
Circumstance where a criminal was killed during the commission of a crime.
Circumstance where a criminal resisted arrest.

relationships.description: Involves a scenario where a criminal attacked a police officer, resulting in the officer killing the criminal.
Involves a scenario where a criminal attacked a fellow officer and was killed by another police officer.
Involves a scenario where a criminal attacked a civilian.
Involves a scenario where a criminal attempted to flee from a crime.
Involves a scenario where a criminal was killed during the commission of a crime.
Involves a scenario where a criminal resisted arrest.
